content: I am getting this error on part 6 of my PSET 4 (frame shift) but have tried debugging several times. I don't understand what's wrong with my code to make the months off by 1 in this case since logically my function should work
subject: pset 4 part 6 error

content: It is possible something is wrong with some of your helper functions that mightve escaped  the tests. I would recommend going to OH to check this out, since I’m not sure if I have any ideas for what might be wrong until I see the code

I had this issue. The problem was that I was altering the date.month and date.year of the Date object that was input to the function, then returning the altered date, instead of creating a new Date object and returning that. Maybe that's what is going wrong for you too?
